cardKey.description: The key of the card to include content from

levelOffset.description: Optional offset to adjust the heading levels of the included content. Should be a number as string (e.g., '+1', '+2' or '-1').

title.description: Whether to include the title of the card in the included content. If 'only' is selected, the title will be the only content included.

pageTitles.description: If discrete, page titles will be included as discrete headings(read asciidoctor docs for more info). If normal, page titles will be included as normal headings.

whitespace.description: Whether to trim initial and final whitespace and newlines from the output. Useful for generating non-AsciiDoc content such as JSON. Default is 'keep'.

escape.description: Type of escaping to apply to the included content. 'json' escapes for JSON strings, 'csv' escapes for CSV fields.
